alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 7:23PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 800 PM MST... At 723 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wickenburg, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 96 and 122. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
